Class CP::Joint::Groove
In: doc_dummy.rb
Parent: Object

One body has a pivot that connects to a linear groove in the other.

Methods

new  

Public Class methods

new(body1, body2, grv_a, grv_b, anchr2)

grv_a and grv_b define the groove on _body1_ and _anchr2_ defines the anchor on _body2_. All coordinates in body local coordinates.
